articles.description: Bryan Gil is determined to break into Tottenham's starting lineup and is going the extra mile to prove a point to Antonio Conte
articles.content: Antonio Conte has rewarded Tottenham players with two days off after late heroics ensured that they progressed through to the Champions League's Round of 16 as Group D winners, but Bryan Gil has stil… [+2138 chars]
